inclusion.criterion: Consent obtained according to Mental Capacity Act 2005
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Convulsive Status epilepticus defined by either: Tonic-clonic SE lasting longer than 5 minutes,
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Status epilepticus that continues despite treatment with benzodiazepine and one antiepileptic medication
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other exclusion criteria not mentioned in the patient's history
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching and generalized shaking, which required valium to cease seizure activity.
